{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Universal ProTaper Retreatment file is a rotary file system used for removing gutta-percha during endodontic retreatment. The end cutting tip of the file refers to the part of the file that is designed to cut and remove the gutta-percha. In the Universal ProTaper Retreatment file system, the end cutting tip is seen in the D-1 file.", "answer_choice": "A"}
